sentences.en: Blessings for fulfilment in your life dance.
sentences.cn: 祝福你实现你的生命之舞.

sentences.en: By following the Real or the Rational, each individual would achieve self - fulfilment.
sentences.cn: 通过追随实在或理性, 每个个体都将获得 自我 实现.

sentences.en: Everyone wants a job with a lot of scope for self - fulfilment.
sentences.cn: 每个人都想有一份能充分发挥自己能力的工作.

sentences.en: Fulfilment might also be called Self Actualisation or expressing one's full potential.
sentences.cn: 自我实现,就是充分发挥自己的潜能.

sentences.en: It was in fact the fulfilment of so many prophecies.
sentences.cn: 事实上,这是很多预言的应验.

sentences.en: May all your dreams and plans turn to fulfilment and success.
sentences.cn: 愿你梦想成真、万事如意.

sentences.en: Most computer games provide some kind of wish fulfilment.
sentences.cn: 大部份电子游戏满足人们的某种愿望.

sentences.en: She needed greater fulfilment in her job.
sentences.cn: 她需要从工作中获得更大的满足感.

sentences.en: The fulfilment of quality objectives needs to be measurable and documented.
sentences.cn: 质量目标的达成必须可加以测量的而且必须形成文件.

sentences.en: Thou crossest desert lands of barren years to reach the moment of fulfilment.
sentences.cn: 您越过不毛之年的沙漠而到达了圆满的时刻.

sentences.en: We insisted upon the fulfilment of the contract.
We must supervise and speed up the fulfilment of assigned tasks.
sentences.cn: 已经布置了的工作,应当认真督促检查.

sentences.en: Your love which fulfilment is dear to my heart.
sentences.cn: 你永无止境的爱,在我的心中是如此珍贵.

sentences.en: Your love which knows not fulfilment is dear to my heart.
sentences.cn: 你的永不满足的爱,对我的心是亲切的.

words.tran_cn: 履行；实现；满足；使结束（等于fulfil）

trans.tran_cn: 履行，执行，实现，完成，实践，成就感，满足感
trans.tran_en: when something you wanted happens or is given to you
